title: Decision
description: A single choice made by the protagonist at a decision point

id.description: Unique identifier for this decision instance

node_id.description: Reference to the graph node where this decision was made

choice_index.description: Which option was selected (0-indexed from available choices at node)

choice_label.description: Human-readable label for the choice made

timestamp.description: When this decision was made in story-time (ISO 8601)

confidence.description: How confident the protagonist was (0=desperate guess, 1=certain)

rationale.description: Why the protagonist made this choice (for narrative use)

influenced_by.description: Knowledge state IDs that influenced this decision
